name: Generation Ship Simulator
description:
A generation ship simulator created for the Jamulator 2021 game jam.

The lives of the final humans left are in your hands, an AGI equipped to handle complex situations involved in managing a spaceship in the long term. Earth has been deemed uninhabitable and humans have fled to space, in search for a new home. No matter how long it takes.

Credits

Art and writing by Garden of Sen
Programming by Precious Navarro

Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
